attributes.action: to encourage more business's to support local community groups
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the Government to encourage more business's to support local community groups, as equal to national charities with the same recognition for incentatives for rewards as they do with national charities. this will encourage more community groups locally to help local and national business's in their areas and benifit the local communities provide a better area for both business and communities reducing crime and making the area safer for all so promoting the business in being supportive in the areas they support community groups
